alert.note: Alert for Iron; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 10:21PM MDT until August 31 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Washington County in southwestern Utah... Central Iron County in southern Utah... * Until 1100 PM MDT * At 1019 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cedar City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated and surface observation confirmed. At 10:10 PM MDT, the Cedar City Municipal Airport recorded a wind gust to 61 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cedar City, Enoch, Parowan, Paragonah, Cedar Breaks National Monument, Summit, Kanarraville, Brian Head and Hamilton Fort. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 46 and 82. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 43 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
